Vps_ScRdWrAdvCfg Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Scaler Config API

Structure to read/write to advance scaler registers. More...

#include <vps_cfgSc.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 chNum

Detailed Description

Structure to read/write to advance scaler registers.

sturct Vps_ScRdWrAdvCfg

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_ScRdWrAdvCfg::chNum

Channel number for which the configuration is to be set/get. Used only in M2M driver, for display and capture driver set this to 0.

UInt32 Vps_ScRdWrAdvCfg::scalerId

Scaler ID - Used in case multiple scalers are present in a driver.

Vps_ScConfig Vps_ScRdWrAdvCfg::scCfg

Scaler configuration to be read/write. All advanced parameters should be set when using this structure
